import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { CurrencyRupeeIcon, BookOpenIcon, AcademicCapIcon, BellIcon, SunIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, UserIcon, Bars3Icon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const SimpleRuralHomePage = ({ onNavigate }) => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const features = [ { id: 'dashboard', title: 'Market Prices', subtitle: 'Live turmeric prices', icon: CurrencyRupeeIcon, color: 'bg-green-500', description: 'Check current market prices' }, { id: 'ledger', title: 'My Sales', subtitle: 'Digital ledger', icon: BookOpenIcon, color: 'bg-blue-500', description: 'Record and track your sales' }, { id: 'learning', title: 'Learn', subtitle: 'Farming tips', icon: AcademicCapIcon, color: 'bg-purple-500', description: 'Watch videos and learn farming' }, { id: 'notifications', title: 'Alerts', subtitle: 'Price updates', icon: BellIcon, color: 'bg-orange-500', description: 'Get price and weather alerts' }, { id: 'weather', title: 'Weather', subtitle: 'Forecast', icon: SunIcon, color: 'bg-yellow-500', description: 'Check weather for farming' }, { id: 'msp', title: 'MSP Rates', subtitle: 'Government prices', icon: ShieldCheckIcon, color: 'bg-indigo-500', description: 'Minimum Support Price' } ]; const handleFeatureClick = (featureId) => { onNavigate(featureId); }; return (
